item.title: Understanding data stories/journeys
item.description: Are they the same? My take on the definitions Story Journey for execs/higher ups for data wranglers high level high + low level not too technical can get technical highly narrative narrative Know your audience Let’s say you’re touching base with someone in the team this coming Friday, prepare for that Friday in the early week by figuring out the audience in the room.
